\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\textbf{\underline{Errores:}}

$\sigma_{f}$$\approx\sqrt{\sigma_{est}^{2}+\sigma_{ap}^{2}}$,$\;$$\sigma f=\sqrt{\left(\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}\right)^{2}\sigma_{x}^{2}+\left(\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\right)^{2}\sigma_{y}^{2}+\cdots}$

\textbf{\underline{Cinemática en $\rm I\!R$:}}

{*}MRU: $x=x_{0}+v\Delta t$, con $v=\frac{\Delta x}{\Delta t}$

{*}MRUV: $x(t)=x_{0}+v_{0}\Delta t+\frac{1}{2}a\Delta t^{2}$, $\quad$$v(t)=v_{0}+a\Delta t$

\textbf{\underline{Cinemática en $\rm I\!R^{2}$ y $\rm I\!R^{3}$:}}

{*}CL/TV:$y(t)=y_{0}+v_{0}\Delta t\pm\frac{1}{2}g\Delta t^{2}$, $\quad$$v(t)=v_{0}\pm g\Delta t$

{*}TO:$\begin{cases}
x(t)=x_{0}+v_{0}\cos\theta\Delta t\\
y(t)=y_{0}+v_{0}\sin\theta\Delta t+\frac{1}{2}a\Delta t^{2}\\
v_{y}(t)=v_{0}\sin\theta-g\Delta t
\end{cases}$

{*}MCU:$\begin{cases}
\theta(t)=\theta_{0}+\omega(t-t_{0})+\frac{1}{2}\alpha(t-t_{0})^{2}\\
\omega=\frac{d\theta}{dt}=\frac{\Delta\theta}{\Delta t}=\omega_{0}+\alpha(t-t_{0})\\
v_{t}=\omega R,a_{c}=\frac{v^{2}}{R}=\omega^{2}R,\:a_{t}=\alpha R
\end{cases}$

\textbf{\underline{Trabajo, potencia, energía:} }

{*}Trabajo:$\mathbf{\mathrm{W_{f}}=F\cdot}\Delta\mathbf{r}$

{*}Energía cinética: $E_{c}=\frac{1}{2}mv^{2}$

{*}Potencia: $P=\frac{dW}{dt}$, $E_{p}=mgh$

\textbf{\underline{Gravitación:}}

{*}Unidad astronómica, cte. gravitación: $\begin{cases}
\mathrm{UA}=1.50\times10^{11}\mathrm{m}\\
\mathrm{G}=6.67384(80)\times10^{-11}\ \mbox{N}\ \mbox{m}^{2}\ \mbox{kg}^{-2}
\end{cases}$
\end{document}
